concept.title: Enabling and disabling the long-tap detector

conbody.p: Use the method EnableLongTapAnimation to enable or disable the long-tap detector and its animation.
The default setting is that the detector and animation are enabled. When set to disabled, the long tap event is not reported and the animation is hidden.
conbody.codeblock: iLongTapDetector->EnableLongTapAnimation ( EFalse ); // event and animation off
